Welcome

Hello! My name is Adam Hanna. Welcome to my website.

Hello and welcome to my website! My name is Adam Hanna and I plan to post new content to this site from time to time. I don't don't expect to stick to any one subject or another but rather plan to keep this as a general collection of my ramblings. I tend to be intereted in software development, technology and politics, so I would expect most of my post to be in one of those three categories.

If you wish to contact me, the easiest way is via [Twitter](https://twitter.com/adam_m_hanna).
